name: Walking Sim (Exercise 3)
description:
This game was created with Yeseon. It is a farming game where players need to collect keys to open gates to either get fruits or enter the house to proceed to the next level. Players can use "wasd" to move and space to jump. The mouse is used to camera rotation, picking up items (left clicking), and opening gates. 

Assets: Low Poly Tree and Terrain Texture from the Unity Asset Store, background music from Bensound -Smile.
